column5: With the warm weather we have been getting out more to play.  The boys were looking particularly handsome even if i do say so myself.   We even got a couple of small ones when the sun went down.
Nice photos!   Winter just won't go away will it?  I need a new camera, what did you use for those photos?

Nice photos!   Winter just won't go away will it?  I need a new camera, what did you use for those photos?  Thanks man,  I use a second hand Canon Powershot SD960 IS Digital Elph. I got sand in the last one this summer  and because they are discontinued I picked up another on Ebay for $35. Really,really, really good little point and shoot cameras with HD Video. Optical zoom is crap at only 4x, but has some good preset shooting options. Shooting sunsets in 'underwater' mode…..WOW!
Jack's really really growing fast. This summer will be a blast for you guys ( when it finally gets there).
looks like a good time to me!

Jack's really really growing fast. This summer will be a blast for you guys ( when it finally gets there).  LOL…i told him the other day that this year is 'our' Lac Seul year. He has many questions about 'lask' Seul. looks like a good time to me! Yuppers…..i might get shot for saying it….but more fun than fishing!
Great pics, Simon. Guard them with your life. Thanks for sharing.
Watching the pics and video of your lad growing up has me green with envy. I know it sounds selfish but  ..... Just sometimes wish my kids would hurry up and make with the grandkids
Great photos Simon ... looks like ice out will be in June ... LOL

Great photos Simon!  What is your prediction for ice out up there?  How much ice is there?  I've got a fly in trip booked and concerned that the ice will still be on the lake at the end of May, hence the questions.
Crisp photos Simon.  Lotsa reds in those skies and on the lad's head.
